extension.name: Snap
extension.description: This extension helps to establish a behavior similar to the ViewPager in the RecyclerView.

events.name: PositionChange
events.description: Event called when the group that is in focus changes, returns its position.

methods.name: SnapIn
methods.description: This method connects the snap extension with the specified RecyclerView.

methods.name: SnapOut
methods.description: Detaches the extension from any RecyclerView that it is linked to.

properties.name: AnimationScaleSize
properties.description:
Specifies the size to which groups that are not in focus are scaled.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*
**Info:**
>Values from 0.0 to 1.0(normal size)

properties.name: FirsItemOffset
properties.description:
Specifies the extra space to add to the beginning and end of the RecyclerView.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*

properties.name: LinearSnap
properties.description:
Determines the behavior of the swipe, when LinearSnap is on it will center the focused element. When disabled, the behavior will be similar to the ViewPager.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*

properties.name: ScaleAnimation
properties.description:
Specifies whether the scaling effect will be activated in the groups each time the focus group changes.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*

group.title: Fancy RecyclerView Widgets
group.description: This extension contains a set of components that can be added when creating a RecyclerView.
